Articles.Content:
I'm having an issue, in that, on a couple different different rockets, i will attempt to throttle up an inactive booster after warping, and the system will not allow me too. also, the staging light is purple. i am using a bad computer right now while i wait to get a new one, so could lag be a contributing factor? any help would be much appreciated.

Edited July 28, 2013 by stupid_chris
Would by any chance, those be unmanned rockets? chances are you run out of electricity.
yeah, that was it. the solar panels broke, but didn't fall off, and i ran out of electricity. Thanks for the help though.
